content: I've been thinking about the farmhouse and the land I inherited from my grandfather. It's been about 3 months since I inherited it, and I've been considering what to do with it. I've been doing some research on the cost of renovations and talking to contractors to get a sense of what it would take to get the place livable. Do you think I should prioritize modernizing the plumbing and electrical systems or focus on cosmetic changes like painting and flooring?
